import axios from "axios"; import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; const Cart = () => { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); const [Thanhtien, setThanhtien] = useState(0); const [Soluong, setSoluong] = useState(1); const fetchData = async () => { try { const response = await axios.get('http://localhost:3308/getcart'); setProducts(response.data); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching data', error); } } useEffect(() => { fetchData(); }, []); const CalculateSum = () => { const giaBan = parseFloat(products.Gia_ban) || 0 const soluong = Soluong || 0 const thanhtien = giaBan * soluong; setThanhtien((preValue) => ({ ...preValue, Thanhtien: thanhtien.toFixed(2)})) } return (
